testcase.name: Register using valid data

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["create_at","department","email","full_name","id","phone_number","update_at"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/trisni.yuliana/Downloads/Bootcamp/apiautomation/target/test-classes/register-schema.json#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["create_at","department","email","full_name","id","phone_number","update_at"] missing: ["create_at","department","email","full_name","id","phone_number","update_at"]
Actual: {"result":"failed","message":"Email = testqa.wrc96@gmail.com already registered"}

testcase.system-out: When Send request to register with body:....................................passed Then The response code must be 200..........................................passed And The response schema should be match with schema "register-schema.json"..failed And The Id is not null......................................................skipped And The email should equal "testqa.wrc96@gmail.com".........................skipped And The full_name should equal "Test QA"....................................skipped And The department should equal "Technology"................................skipped And The phone_number should equal "085611789000"............................skipped
